description: The Input component is a flexible and customizable UI element for user input. It supports various styles, sizes, decorators, and can display helper text and error messages.

props.name: error
props.description: If true, the input will display an error state.

props.name: helperText
props.description: The helper text for the input.

props.name: required
props.description: If true, the input will display a required indicator.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the input is disabled.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the input will take up the full width of its container.

examples.title: Sizes
examples.description: Different sizes of inputs including medium and small.
examples.code:
<Input label="Small Input" size="small" placeholder="Enter text" />
<Input label="Medium Input" size="medium" placeholder="Enter text" />
